sourceDesc.p: Born digital, but generated using XSLT.

person.education: Masters of Library and Information Science in at University of Alberta, Edmonton, Alberta.
Masters of Arts in English at University of British Columbia, Vancouver, British Columbia.
Bachelor of Arts (Honours with distinction) in English and Women’s Studies (minor) at University of Victoria, Victoria, British Columbia.

occupation.p: Developer at Digital Humanities Innovation Lab (Simon Fraser University).
Programmer at Linked Early Modern Drama Online (University of Victoria).
Programmer at The Map of Early Modern London (University of Victoria).
Programmer at Landscapes of Injustice (University of Victoria).
Digital Humanities Consultant at The Public Humanities Hub (University of British Columbia).
Programmer at Winnifred Eaton Archive (University of British Columbia).
Programmer at Stratford Festival Promptbook Protocol The Stratford Festival Online.
Programmer at The Internet Shakespeare Editions.
Junior Programmer/Research Assistant at Endings .
Junior Programmer/Consultant at The Map of Early Modern London .
